original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco akatakalyāṇo hoti, akatakusalo, akatabhīruttāṇo, katapāpo, kataluddo, katakibbiso.
analyzed: ▁idha ▁bhikkhave ▁ekacc o ▁akat a kalyāṇ o ▁hoti ▁akat akusal o ▁akat ab hīr u ttā ṇ o ▁kat a pāp o ▁kat a ludd o ▁kat a ki bb i so

original: So ‘akataṁ me kalyāṇan’tipi tappati, ‘kataṁ me pāpan’tipi tappati.
analyzed: ▁so ▁akat aṃ ▁me ▁kalyāṇ anti pi ▁tap pati ▁kataṃ ▁me ▁pāp anti pi ▁tap pati

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā tapanīyā”ti.
Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
